entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -38.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -38.4°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -42.2°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
